00042 static void gtb_pot(Interaction* P,
00043                     const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00044                     const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00045                     const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00046                     const gradGaussianAux* dX13,
00047                     complex double* v, gradGaussian* dv)
00048 {       
00049   int TT, tautau;
00050 
00051   TT = X13->T * X24->T;
00052   tautau = ((1-G1->xi*G3->xi)*(1-G2->xi*G4->xi))/4+(G1->xi*G4->xi+G2->xi*G3->xi)/2; 
00053 
00054   if (!(TT || tautau)) return;
00055 
00056   complex double SS; 
00057   gradSpinor dSS;
00058   complex double RR;
00059   gradScalar dRR;
00060   complex double lambda, alpha, rho[3], rho2, pi[3], pi2;
00061   complex double dlambda, dalpha;
00062   gradVector drho, dpi;
00063   gradScalar drho2, dpi2;
00064   complex double sigsig;
00065   gradSpinor dsigsig;
00066 
00067   complex double ltheta, rtheta;
00068   complex double dltheta, drtheta;
00069   complex double beta, dbeta, theta, dtheta;
00070   complex double psi, dpsi;
00071   
00072   complex double rhopi;
00073   gradScalar drhopi;
00074 
00075   complex double rhoxpi[3];
00076   complex double L2;
00077   gradScalar dL2;
00078   
00079   complex double S[3], LS;
00080   gradGaussian dLS;
00081   
00082   complex double lsigrho, rsigrho, S12;
00083   gradGaussian dS12;

00085   complex double lsigpi, rsigpi, lsigrhoxpi, rsigrhoxpi;
00086

00088   gradGaussian dS12ll, dS12pipi, dS12rhopi;
00089 
00090   complex double vcoul;
00091   gradScalar dvcoul;

00093   int i;
00094   
00095   SS = X13->S * X24->S; 
00096   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00097     dSS.chi[i] = dX13->dS.chi[i]* X24->S;
00098   
00099   RR = X13->R * X24->R;
00100   dRR.a = dX13->dR.a* X24->R;
00101   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00102     dRR.b[i] = dX13->dR.b[i]* X24->R;
00103   
00104   lambda = X13->lambda + X24->lambda;
00105   dlambda = dX13->dlambda;
00106 
00107   alpha = X13->alpha + X24->alpha;
00108   dalpha = dX13->dalpha;
00109   
00110   for (i=0; i<3; i++) { 
00111     rho[i] = X13->rho[i] - X24->rho[i];
00112     drho.a[i] = dX13->drho.a[i];
00113   }
00114   drho.b = dX13->drho.b;
00115 
00116   rho2 = cvec3sqr(rho);
00117   drho2.a = 2*cvec3mult(drho.a, rho);
00118   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00119     drho2.b[i] = 2*drho.b*rho[i];
00120   
00121   for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00122     pi[i] = 0.5*(X13->pi[i] - X24->pi[i]);
00123     dpi.a[i] = 0.5*dX13->dpi.a[i];
00124   }
00125   dpi.b = 0.5*dX13->dpi.b;
00126 
00127   sigsig = cvec3mult(X13->sig, X24->sig);
00128   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00129     dsigsig.chi[i] = cvec3mult(dX13->dsig.chi[i], X24->sig);
00130 
00131   if (P->momentump2 || P->momentumpr2 || P->l2 || P->l2ls || P->tll || P->tpp || P->prtrp || P->l2tpp) {
00132     rtheta = (conj(G1->a)*X13->lambda + conj(G2->a)*X24->lambda);
00133     ltheta = (G3->a*X13->lambda + G4->a*X24->lambda);
00134     dltheta = - G3->a* csqr(X13->lambda);
00135     drtheta = X13->lambda - conj(G1->a)*csqr(X13->lambda);
00136     
00137     beta = I*(rtheta-ltheta);
00138     dbeta = I*(drtheta-dltheta);
00139     
00140     theta = ltheta*rtheta;
00141     dtheta = dltheta*rtheta+ltheta*drtheta;
00142  
00143     psi = theta - alpha*lambda;
00144     dpsi = dtheta - dalpha*lambda - alpha*dlambda;
00145     
00146     pi2 = cvec3sqr(pi);
00147     dpi2.a = 2*cvec3mult(dpi.a, pi);
00148     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00149       dpi2.b[i] = 2*dpi.b*pi[i];    
00150 
00151     rhopi = cvec3mult(rho, pi);
00152     drhopi.a = cvec3mult(drho.a, pi)+cvec3mult(rho, dpi.a);
00153     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00154       drhopi.b[i] = drho.b*pi[i]+rho[i]*dpi.b;
00155   }
00156     
00157   if (P->l2 || P->spinorbit || P->l2ls || P->tll || P->tpp || P->l2tpp){
00158     cvec3cross(rho, pi, rhoxpi);
00159     
00160     L2 = cvec3sqr(rhoxpi);
00161     
00162     dL2.a = drho2.a*pi2 + rho2*dpi2.a - 2*rhopi*drhopi.a;
00163     for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00164       dL2.b[i] = drho2.b[i]*pi2 + rho2*dpi2.b[i] - 2*rhopi*drhopi.b[i];
00165   }
00166     
00167   if (P->spinorbit || P->l2ls) {
00168     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00169       S[i] = 0.5*(X13->sig[i]*X24->S+X13->S*X24->sig[i]);
00170     LS = cvec3mult(rhoxpi, S);
00171 
00172     for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00173       dLS.chi[i] = 0.5*(cvec3mult(dX13->dsig.chi[i], rhoxpi)*X24->S +
00174                         dX13->dS.chi[i]*cvec3mult(X24->sig, rhoxpi));
00175     
00176     dLS.a = cvec3spat(drho.a, pi, S) + cvec3spat(rho, dpi.a, S);
00177     dLS.b[0] = (drho.b*pi[1]-rho[1]*dpi.b)*S[2] - 
00178                (drho.b*pi[2]-rho[2]*dpi.b)*S[1];
00179     dLS.b[1] = (drho.b*pi[2]-rho[2]*dpi.b)*S[0] - 
00180                (drho.b*pi[0]-rho[0]*dpi.b)*S[2];
00181     dLS.b[2] = (drho.b*pi[0]-rho[0]*dpi.b)*S[1] - 
00182                (drho.b*pi[1]-rho[1]*dpi.b)*S[0];
00183   }
00184 
00185   if (P->tensor || P->tll || P->tpp || P->prtrp || P->l2tpp) {
00186     lsigrho = cvec3mult(X13->sig, rho); 
00187     rsigrho = cvec3mult(X24->sig, rho);
00188     
00189     S12 = 3*lsigrho*rsigrho - sigsig*rho2;
00190 
00191     for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00192       dS12.chi[i] = 3*cvec3mult(dX13->dsig.chi[i], rho)*rsigrho - dsigsig.chi[i]*rho2;
00193     
00194     dS12.a = 3*(cvec3mult(X13->sig, drho.a)*rsigrho + lsigrho*cvec3mult(X24->sig, drho.a)) - 
00195       sigsig*drho2.a;
00196               
00197     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00198       dS12.b[i] = 3*drho.b*(X13->sig[i]*rsigrho + lsigrho*X24->sig[i]) -
00199         sigsig* drho2.b[i];
00200   }
00201     
00202   if (P->tll || P->tpp || P->prtrp || P->l2tpp) { 
00203     lsigpi = cvec3mult(X13->sig, pi);
00204     rsigpi = cvec3mult(X24->sig, pi);
00205                 
00206     // S12pipi
00207     S12pipi = 3*lsigpi*rsigpi - sigsig*pi2;
00208     
00209     dS12pipi.a = 3*(cvec3mult(X13->sig, dpi.a)*rsigpi + lsigpi*cvec3mult(X24->sig, dpi.a)) -
00210                  sigsig*dpi2.a;
00211  
00212     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00213       dS12pipi.b[i] = 3*dpi.b*(X13->sig[i]*rsigpi + lsigpi*X24->sig[i]) - sigsig*dpi2.b[i];
00214 
00215     for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00216       dS12pipi.chi[i] = 3*cvec3mult(dX13->dsig.chi[i], pi)*rsigpi - dsigsig.chi[i]*pi2;
00217                  
00218     // S12rhopi    
00219     S12rhopi = 1.5*(lsigrho*rsigpi + lsigpi*rsigrho) - sigsig*rhopi;
00220         
00221     dS12rhopi.a = 1.5*(cvec3mult(X13->sig,drho.a)*rsigpi + 
00222                        lsigrho*cvec3mult(X24->sig,dpi.a) +
00223                        cvec3mult(X13->sig,dpi.a)*rsigrho + 
00224                        lsigpi*cvec3mult(X24->sig,drho.a)) -
00225                   sigsig*drhopi.a;
00226 
00227     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00228       dS12rhopi.b[i] = 1.5*(drho.b*X13->sig[i]*rsigpi + lsigrho*dpi.b*X24->sig[i] +
00229                             dpi.b*X13->sig[i]*rsigrho + lsigpi*drho.b*X24->sig[i]) -
00230                        sigsig*drhopi.b[i];
00231       
00232     for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00233       dS12rhopi.chi[i] = 1.5*(cvec3mult(dX13->dsig.chi[i],rho)*rsigpi +
00234                               cvec3mult(dX13->dsig.chi[i],pi)*rsigrho) -
00235                          dsigsig.chi[i]*rhopi;  
00236     
00237   }
00238     
00239   if (P->tll || P->tpp || P->l2tpp) {
00240     lsigrhoxpi = cvec3mult(X13->sig, rhoxpi);
00241     rsigrhoxpi = cvec3mult(X24->sig, rhoxpi);
00242   
00243     // S12ll
00244     S12ll = 3*lsigrhoxpi*rsigrhoxpi - sigsig*L2;
00245     
00246     dS12ll.a = 3*((cvec3spat(X13->sig, drho.a, pi) + 
00247                    cvec3spat(X13->sig, rho, dpi.a))*rsigrhoxpi +
00248                   (cvec3spat(X24->sig, drho.a, pi) + 
00249                    cvec3spat(X24->sig, rho, dpi.a))*lsigrhoxpi) -
00250                sigsig*dL2.a;
00251                
00252     dS12ll.b[0] = 3*((X13->sig[1]*(dpi.b*rho[2] - drho.b*pi[2]) -
00253                       X13->sig[2]*(dpi.b*rho[1] - drho.b*pi[1]))*rsigrhoxpi +
00254                      (X24->sig[1]*(dpi.b*rho[2] - drho.b*pi[2]) -
00255                       X24->sig[2]*(dpi.b*rho[1] - drho.b*pi[1]))*lsigrhoxpi) -
00256                   sigsig*dL2.b[0];
00257 
00258     dS12ll.b[1] = 3*((X13->sig[2]*(dpi.b*rho[0] - drho.b*pi[0]) -
00259                       X13->sig[0]*(dpi.b*rho[2] - drho.b*pi[2]))*rsigrhoxpi +
00260                      (X24->sig[2]*(dpi.b*rho[0] - drho.b*pi[0]) -
00261                       X24->sig[0]*(dpi.b*rho[2] - drho.b*pi[2]))*lsigrhoxpi) -
00262                   sigsig*dL2.b[1];
00263     
00264     dS12ll.b[2] = 3*((X13->sig[0]*(dpi.b*rho[1] - drho.b*pi[1]) -
00265                       X13->sig[1]*(dpi.b*rho[0] - drho.b*pi[0]))*rsigrhoxpi +
00266                      (X24->sig[0]*(dpi.b*rho[1] - drho.b*pi[1]) -
00267                       X24->sig[1]*(dpi.b*rho[0] - drho.b*pi[0]))*lsigrhoxpi) -
00268                   sigsig*dL2.b[2];
00269                                 
00270     for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00271       dS12ll.chi[i] = 3*cvec3mult(dX13->dsig.chi[i], rhoxpi)*rsigrhoxpi - 
00272                       dsigsig.chi[i]*L2;
00273 
00274   }

00276   // kappa-dependent auxiliaries
00277   InteractionType type;
00278   double gamma, kappa;
00279   complex double iakapi, kapakapi, diakapi, dkapakapi;
00280   complex double thelakapi, dthelakapi;
00281   complex double Gi;
00282   gradScalar dGi;
00283 
00284   
00285   complex double PiPi, PiPiG, PirPir;
00286   gradScalar dPiPi, dPiPiG, dPirPir;
00287   int pipidone=0, pipigdone=0, pirpirdone=0;
00288   
00289   complex double LL;
00290   gradScalar dLL;
00291   int l2done=0;
00292   
00293   complex double L2LS;
00294   gradGaussian dL2LS;
00295   int l2lsdone=0;
00296   
00297   complex double TLL, TPP, TRP;
00298   gradGaussian dTLL, dTPP, dTRP;
00299   int tlldone=0, tppdone=0, trpdone=0;
00300   
00301   complex double L2TPP;
00302   gradGaussian dL2TPP;
00303   int l2tppdone=0;
00304   
00305   complex double tppll, tpppipi, tpprhopi, tpprr;
00306   complex double trppipi, trprhopi, trprr;
00307   complex double l2tpppipi, l2tpprhopi, l2tpprr, l2tppll;
00308   
00309   gradScalar dl2tpppipi, dl2tpprhopi, dl2tpprr, dl2tppll;
00310   
00311   int idx;
00312 
00313   for (idx=0; idx<P->ncomponents; idx++) {
00314 
00315     type = P->c[idx].type;
00316     gamma = P->c[idx].gamma;
00317     kappa = P->c[idx].kappa;
00318     
00319     if ((idx==0 || kappa != P->c[idx-1].kappa) && type != VC) {
00320       iakapi = 1.0/(alpha+kappa);
00321       diakapi = -dalpha*csqr(iakapi);
00322       kapakapi = kappa*iakapi;
00323       dkapakapi = kappa*diakapi;
00324       if (P->l2 || P->l2ls || P->tll || P->tpp || P->prtrp || P->l2tpp) {
00325         thelakapi = theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi;
00326         dthelakapi = dtheta*iakapi + theta*diakapi + dlambda*kapakapi + lambda*dkapakapi;
00327       }
00328       
00329       Gi = cpow32(kapakapi)*cexp(-0.5*rho2*iakapi);
00330       dGi.a = (1.5*dkapakapi/kapakapi-0.5*diakapi*rho2-0.5*iakapi*drho2.a)*Gi;
00331       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00332         dGi.b[i] = -0.5*drho2.b[i]*iakapi*Gi;
00333       
00334       pipidone = 0;
00335       pipigdone = 0;
00336       pirpirdone = 0;
00337       l2done = 0;
00338       l2lsdone = 0;
00339       tlldone = 0;
00340       tppdone = 0;
00341       trpdone = 0;
00342       l2tppdone = 0;
00343     }
00344 
00345     // p2V
00346     if (!pipidone && (p2V <= type && type <= tsp2V)) {
00347       PiPi = pi2-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi+
00348         0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2+
00349         0.75*(lambda-theta*iakapi);
00350       
00351       dPiPi.a = dpi2.a - 0.5*dbeta*iakapi*rhopi - 0.5*beta*diakapi*rhopi -
00352         0.5*beta*iakapi*drhopi.a + 0.25*dtheta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2 +
00353         0.5*theta*diakapi*iakapi*rho2 + 0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*drho2.a +
00354         0.75*dlambda - 0.75*dtheta*iakapi - 0.75*theta*diakapi;
00355       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00356         dPiPi.b[i] = dpi2.b[i] - 0.5*beta*iakapi*drhopi.b[i] + 
00357                      0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*drho2.b[i];
00358 
00359       pipidone = 1;
00360     }
00361 
00362     // Vp2
00363     if (!pipigdone && (Vp2 <= type && type <= tsVp2)) {
00364       PiPiG = pi2-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi+
00365         (0.25*theta-0.5)*csqr(iakapi)*rho2+
00366         0.75*lambda-(0.75*theta-1.5)*iakapi;
00367       
00368       dPiPiG.a = dpi2.a - 0.5*dbeta*iakapi*rhopi - 0.5*beta*diakapi*rhopi -
00369         0.5*beta*iakapi*drhopi.a + 0.25*dtheta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2 +
00370         (0.5*theta-1.0)*diakapi*iakapi*rho2 + (0.25*theta-0.5)*csqr(iakapi)*drho2.a +
00371         0.75*dlambda - 0.75*dtheta*iakapi - (0.75*theta-1.5)*diakapi;
00372       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00373         dPiPiG.b[i] = dpi2.b[i] - 0.5*beta*iakapi*drhopi.b[i] + 
00374           (0.25*theta-0.5)*csqr(iakapi)*drho2.b[i];
00375 
00376       pipigdone = 1;
00377     }
00378 
00379     // pr2V
00380     if (!pirpirdone && (pr2V <= type && type <= tspr2V)) {
00381       PirPir = 
00382         csqr(kapakapi)*(csqr(rhopi)-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi*rho2+
00383                         0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*csqr(rho2))+
00384         alpha*kapakapi*(pi2-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi+0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2) -
00385         2*csqr(kapakapi)*(-beta*rhopi+theta*iakapi*rho2) +
00386         0.25*(csqr(kapakapi)*rho2+3*alpha*kapakapi)*(lambda-theta*iakapi) +
00387         3*csqr(kapakapi)*theta;
00388       
00389       dPirPir.a = 
00390         2*kapakapi*dkapakapi*
00391         (csqr(rhopi)-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi*rho2+0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*csqr(rho2))+
00392         csqr(kapakapi)*
00393         (2*rhopi*drhopi.a-0.5*dbeta*iakapi*rhopi*rho2-0.5*beta*diakapi*rhopi*rho2-
00394          0.5*beta*iakapi*drhopi.a*rho2-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi*drho2.a+
00395          0.25*dtheta*csqr(iakapi)*csqr(rho2)+0.5*theta*iakapi*diakapi*csqr(rho2)+
00396          0.5*theta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2*drho2.a) +
00397         (dalpha*kapakapi+alpha*dkapakapi)*
00398         (pi2-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi+0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2)+
00399         alpha*kapakapi*
00400         (dpi2.a-0.5*dbeta*iakapi*rhopi-0.5*beta*diakapi*rhopi-
00401          0.5*beta*iakapi*drhopi.a+0.25*dtheta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2+
00402          0.5*theta*iakapi*diakapi*rho2+0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*drho2.a) -
00403         4*kapakapi*dkapakapi*(-beta*rhopi+theta*iakapi*rho2) -
00404         2*csqr(kapakapi)*
00405         (-dbeta*rhopi-beta*drhopi.a+dtheta*iakapi*rho2+theta*diakapi*rho2+
00406          theta*iakapi*drho2.a) +
00407         0.25*(2*kapakapi*dkapakapi*rho2+csqr(kapakapi)*drho2.a+3*dalpha*kapakapi+
00408               3*alpha*dkapakapi)*(lambda-theta*iakapi)+
00409         0.25*(csqr(kapakapi)*rho2+3*alpha*kapakapi)*(dlambda-dtheta*iakapi-theta*diakapi) +
00410         6*kapakapi*dkapakapi*theta + 3*csqr(kapakapi)*dtheta;
00411 
00412       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00413         dPirPir.b[i] =  
00414           csqr(kapakapi)*(2*rhopi*drhopi.b[i]-0.5*beta*iakapi*drhopi.b[i]*rho2-
00415                           0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi*drho2.b[i]+
00416                           0.5*theta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2*drho2.b[i]) +
00417           alpha*kapakapi*
00418           (dpi2.b[i]-0.5*beta*iakapi*drhopi.b[i]+0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*drho2.b[i]) -
00419           2*csqr(kapakapi)*(-beta*drhopi.b[i]+theta*iakapi*drho2.b[i]) +
00420           0.25*(csqr(kapakapi)*drho2.b[i])*(lambda-theta*iakapi);
00421 
00422       pirpirdone = 1;
00423     }
00424 
00425     // Vl2
00426     if (!l2done && (Vl2 <= type && type <= tsVl2)) {
00427       LL = kapakapi*
00428              (kapakapi*L2 + 2*alpha*pi2 - beta*rhopi + 0.5*(theta*iakapi+lambda*kapakapi)*rho2 -
00429               1.5*(theta - alpha*lambda));
00430              
00431       dLL.a = dkapakapi*LL/kapakapi +
00432               kapakapi*
00433                 (dkapakapi*L2 + kapakapi*dL2.a + 2*dalpha*pi2 + 2*alpha*dpi2.a -
00434                  dbeta*rhopi - beta*drhopi.a +
00435                  0.5*(dtheta*iakapi + theta*diakapi + dlambda*kapakapi + lambda*dkapakapi)*rho2 +
00436                  0.5*(theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*drho2.a - 
00437                  1.5*(dtheta - dalpha*lambda - alpha*dlambda));
00438               
00439       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00440         dLL.b[i] = kapakapi*
00441                      (kapakapi*dL2.b[i] + 2*alpha*dpi2.b[i] - beta*drhopi.b[i] +
00442                       0.5*(theta*iakapi+lambda*kapakapi)*drho2.b[i]);  
00443               
00444       l2done = 1;
00445               
00446     }
00447 
00448 
00449     // Vl2ls
00450     if (!l2lsdone && (type == Vl2ls || type == tVl2ls)) {
00451       L2LS = LS*csqr(kapakapi)*
00452                (kapakapi*L2 + 4*alpha*pi2 - 2*beta*rhopi + (theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*rho2 -
00453                 5*(theta - alpha*lambda)) + 
00454              2*LS*kapakapi;
00455                     
00456       dL2LS.a = (dLS.a*csqr(kapakapi)+2*kapakapi*dkapakapi*LS)*
00457                   (kapakapi*L2 + 4*alpha*pi2 - 2*beta*rhopi + (theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*rho2 - 
00458                    5*(theta - alpha*lambda)) +
00459                 LS*csqr(kapakapi)*
00460                   (dkapakapi*L2 + kapakapi*dL2.a + 
00461                    4*(dalpha*pi2 + alpha*dpi2.a) - 2*(dbeta*rhopi + beta*drhopi.a) +
00462                    (dtheta*iakapi + theta*diakapi + dlambda*kapakapi + lambda*dkapakapi)*rho2 +
00463                    (theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*drho2.a -
00464                    5*(dtheta - dalpha*lambda - alpha*dlambda)) +
00465                 2*dLS.a*kapakapi + 2*LS*dkapakapi;
00466                 
00467       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00468         dL2LS.b[i] = csqr(kapakapi)*dLS.b[i]*
00469                        (kapakapi*L2 + 4*alpha*pi2 - 2*beta*rhopi + (theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*rho2 -
00470                         5*(theta - alpha*lambda)) +
00471                      csqr(kapakapi)*LS*
00472                        (kapakapi*dL2.b[i] + 4*alpha*dpi2.b[i] - 2*beta*drhopi.b[i] +
00473                         (theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*drho2.b[i]) +
00474                      2*kapakapi*dLS.b[i];
00475                      
00476       for(i=0; i<2; i++)
00477         dL2LS.chi[i] = csqr(kapakapi)*dLS.chi[i]*
00478                          (kapakapi*L2 + 4*alpha*pi2 - 2*beta*rhopi + (theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*rho2 - 
00479                           5*(theta - alpha*lambda)) + 2*dLS.chi[i]*kapakapi;
00480 
00481       l2lsdone = 1;                 
00482     }               
00483     
00484     // VTll - S12(l,l)
00485     if (!tlldone && (type == VTll || type == tVTll)) {
00486       TLL = kapakapi*(kapakapi*S12ll - alpha*S12pipi -
00487                       0.25*(theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*S12 +
00488                       0.5*beta*S12rhopi);
00489             
00490       dTLL.a = dkapakapi*TLL/kapakapi +
00491                kapakapi*
00492                  (dkapakapi*S12ll + kapakapi*dS12ll.a - dalpha*S12pipi - alpha*dS12pipi.a -
00493                   0.25*(dtheta*iakapi + theta*diakapi + dlambda*kapakapi + lambda*dkapakapi)*S12 -
00494                   0.25*(theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*dS12.a +
00495                   0.5*dbeta*S12rhopi + 0.5*beta*dS12rhopi.a);
00496                          
00497       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00498         dTLL.b[i] = kapakapi*(kapakapi*dS12ll.b[i] - alpha*dS12pipi.b[i] - 
00499                               0.25*(theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*dS12.b[i] +
00500                               0.5*beta*dS12rhopi.b[i]);
00501                               
00502       for(i=0; i<2; i++)
00503         dTLL.chi[i] = kapakapi*(kapakapi*dS12ll.chi[i] - alpha*dS12pipi.chi[i] - 
00504                                 0.25*(theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi)*dS12.chi[i] +
00505                                 0.5*beta*dS12rhopi.chi[i]);      
00506       tlldone = 1;
00507     }
00508     
00509     // VTpp - S12(p,p)
00510     if (!tppdone && (type == VTpp || type == tVTpp)) {
00511       tppll = 5*alpha + kapakapi*rho2;    
00512       
00513       tpppipi = 9*csqr(alpha) + 13*alpha*kapakapi*rho2 + 2*csqr(kapakapi*rho2);
00514       
00515       tpprhopi = 4.5*alpha*beta + 16*alpha*kapakapi*rhopi + 2.5*beta*kapakapi*rho2 + 
00516                  4*csqr(kapakapi)*rhopi*rho2;
00517       
00518       tpprr = 5.25*kapakapi*(theta - alpha*lambda) + 2.25*theta - 4.5 + 
00519               2*csqr(kapakapi*rhopi) + 4*kapakapi*beta*rhopi - 
00520               0.75*kapakapi*(theta*iakapi + kapakapi*lambda)*rho2;
00521       
00522               
00523       TPP = csqr(kapakapi)*
00524               (kapakapi*S12ll*tppll + S12pipi*tpppipi - S12rhopi*tpprhopi + S12*tpprr);
00525                             
00526       dTPP.a = 2*TPP/kapakapi*dkapakapi + 
00527                csqr(kapakapi)*
00528                  ((dkapakapi*S12ll + kapakapi*dS12ll.a)*tppll +
00529                    kapakapi*S12ll*(5*dalpha + dkapakapi*rho2 + kapakapi*drho2.a) +
00530                    dS12pipi.a*tpppipi +
00531                    S12pipi*
00532                      (18*alpha*dalpha + 
00533                       13*(dalpha*kapakapi*rho2 + alpha*dkapakapi*rho2 + alpha*kapakapi*drho2.a) +
00534                       4*kapakapi*rho2*(dkapakapi*rho2 + kapakapi*drho2.a)) -
00535                    dS12rhopi.a*tpprhopi -
00536                    S12rhopi*
00537                      (4.5*(dalpha*beta + alpha*dbeta) +
00538                       16*(dalpha*kapakapi*rhopi + alpha*dkapakapi*rhopi + alpha*kapakapi*drhopi.a) +
00539                       2.5*(dbeta*kapakapi*rho2 + beta*dkapakapi*rho2 + beta*kapakapi*drho2.a) +
00540                       4*(2*kapakapi*dkapakapi*rhopi*rho2 + 
00541                          csqr(kapakapi)*(drhopi.a*rho2 + rhopi*drho2.a))) +
00542                    dS12.a*tpprr +
00543                    S12*(5.25*dkapakapi*(theta - alpha*lambda) + 
00544                         5.25*kapakapi*(dtheta - dalpha*lambda - alpha*dlambda) +
00545                         2.25*dtheta + 4*kapakapi*rhopi*(dkapakapi*rhopi + kapakapi*drhopi.a) +
00546                         4*(dkapakapi*beta*rhopi + kapakapi*dbeta*rhopi + kapakapi*beta*drhopi.a) -
00547                         0.75*(dkapakapi*rho2 + kapakapi*drho2.a)*(theta*iakapi + kapakapi*lambda) -
00548                         0.75*kapakapi*
00549                           (dtheta*iakapi + theta*diakapi + dkapakapi*lambda + kapakapi*dlambda)*rho2));
00550                           
00551       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00552         dTPP.b[i] = csqr(kapakapi)*
00553                     (kapakapi*dS12ll.b[i]*tppll + csqr(kapakapi)*S12ll*drho2.b[i] +
00554                      dS12pipi.b[i]*tpppipi +
00555                      S12pipi*(13*alpha*kapakapi*drho2.b[i] + 4*csqr(kapakapi)*rho2*drho2.b[i]) -
00556                      dS12rhopi.b[i]*tpprhopi -
00557                      S12rhopi*(16*alpha*kapakapi*drhopi.b[i] + 2.5*beta*kapakapi*drho2.b[i] +
00558                                4*csqr(kapakapi)*(drhopi.b[i]*rho2 + rhopi*drho2.b[i])) +
00559                      dS12.b[i]*tpprr +
00560                      S12*(4*csqr(kapakapi)*rhopi*drhopi.b[i] + 4*kapakapi*beta*drhopi.b[i] -
00561                           0.75*kapakapi*(theta*iakapi + kapakapi*lambda)*drho2.b[i]));
00562                             
00563       for(i=0; i<2; i++)
00564         dTPP.chi[i] = csqr(kapakapi)*
00565                       (kapakapi*dS12ll.chi[i]*tppll + dS12pipi.chi[i]*tpppipi - 
00566                        dS12rhopi.chi[i]*tpprhopi + dS12.chi[i]*tpprr); 
00567                                                 
00568       tppdone = 1;
00569     }
00570     
00571     // prVTrp (p_r v(r) +v(r) p_r) S12(r,p)
00572     if (!trpdone && (type == prVTrp || type == tprVTrp)) {
00573       trppipi = 2*alpha*(3*alpha + kapakapi*rho2);
00574       
00575       trprhopi = -1.5*alpha*beta*(2 - 7*kapakapi) - 0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*beta*iakapi*csqr(rho2) +
00576                  2*kapakapi*(3*alpha + kapakapi*rho2)*rhopi - 
00577                  0.5*kapakapi*beta*(5 - 12*kapakapi)*rho2;
00578       
00579       trprr = 1.5*theta - 2.625*kapakapi*csqr(beta) - 3 + 
00580               0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*beta*iakapi*rho2*rhopi -
00581               2*kapakapi*(alpha*pi2 + kapakapi*csqr(rhopi)) - 
00582               0.5*kapakapi*beta*(1 + 9*kapakapi)*rhopi +
00583               0.375*kapakapi*iakapi*csqr(beta)*rho2; 
00584       
00585       // NOTE: 06/08/03 Added factor 0.5 implied in the hermitization of the super operator basis
00586       TRP = 0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*(S12pipi*trppipi + S12*trprr + S12rhopi*trprhopi);
00587       
00588       // NOTE: 06/08/03 Added factor 0.5 in the (long) 2nd term of dTRP.a - it's included in the 
00589       //       1st term via TRP ! Corrected dTRP.b and dTRP.chi, too.
00590       dTRP.a = 2*TRP/kapakapi*dkapakapi +
00591                0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*
00592                  (dS12pipi.a*trppipi +
00593                   S12pipi*2*(6*alpha*dalpha + dalpha*kapakapi*rho2 + 
00594                              alpha*(dkapakapi*rho2 + kapakapi*drho2.a)) +
00595                   dS12rhopi.a*trprhopi +
00596                   S12rhopi*
00597                     (-1.5*(dalpha*beta + alpha*dbeta)*(2-7*kapakapi) + 
00598                      10.5*alpha*beta*dkapakapi - kapakapi*dkapakapi*beta*iakapi*csqr(rho2) -
00599                       0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*
00600                         (dbeta*iakapi*csqr(rho2) + beta*diakapi*csqr(rho2) + 
00601                          2*beta*iakapi*rho2*drho2.a) +
00602                       2*dkapakapi*(3*alpha + kapakapi*rho2)*rhopi +
00603                       2*kapakapi*(3*dalpha + dkapakapi*rho2 + kapakapi*drho2.a)*rhopi +
00604                       2*kapakapi*(3*alpha + kapakapi*rho2)*drhopi.a -
00605                       0.5*(dkapakapi*beta + kapakapi*dbeta)*(5 - 12*kapakapi)*rho2 +
00606                       6*kapakapi*beta*dkapakapi*rho2 -
00607                       0.5*kapakapi*beta*(5 - 12*kapakapi)*drho2.a) +
00608                   dS12.a*trprr +
00609                   S12*(1.5*dtheta - 2.625*dkapakapi*csqr(beta) - 5.25*kapakapi*beta*dbeta +
00610                        kapakapi*dkapakapi*beta*iakapi*rho2*rhopi +
00611                        0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*(dbeta*iakapi + beta*diakapi)*rho2*rhopi +
00612                        0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*beta*iakapi*(drho2.a*rhopi + rho2*drhopi.a) -
00613                        2*dkapakapi*(alpha*pi2 + kapakapi*csqr(rhopi)) -
00614                        2*kapakapi*(dalpha*pi2 + alpha*dpi2.a + dkapakapi*csqr(rhopi) + 
00615                        2*kapakapi*rhopi*drhopi.a) -
00616                        0.5*(dkapakapi*beta + kapakapi*dbeta)*(1 + 9*kapakapi)*rhopi -
00617                        4.5*kapakapi*beta*dkapakapi*rhopi -
00618                        0.5*kapakapi*beta*(1 + 9*kapakapi)*drhopi.a +
00619                        0.375*(dkapakapi*iakapi + kapakapi*diakapi)*csqr(beta)*rho2 +
00620                        0.75*kapakapi*iakapi*beta*dbeta*rho2 +
00621                        0.375*kapakapi*iakapi*csqr(beta)*drho2.a));
00622       
00623       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00624         dTRP.b[i] = 0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*
00625                     (dS12pipi.b[i]*trppipi + S12pipi*2*alpha*kapakapi*drho2.b[i] +
00626                      dS12rhopi.b[i]*trprhopi +
00627                      S12rhopi*(-csqr(kapakapi)*beta*iakapi*rho2*drho2.b[i] +
00628                                 6*kapakapi*alpha*drhopi.b[i] +
00629                                 2*csqr(kapakapi)*(drho2.b[i]*rhopi + rho2*drhopi.b[i]) -
00630                                 0.5*kapakapi*beta*(5 - 12*kapakapi)*drho2.b[i]) +
00631                      dS12.b[i]*trprr +
00632                      S12*(0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*beta*iakapi*(drho2.b[i]*rhopi +rho2*drhopi.b[i]) -
00633                           2*kapakapi*(alpha*dpi2.b[i] + 2*kapakapi*rhopi*drhopi.b[i]) -
00634                           0.5*kapakapi*beta*(1 + 9*kapakapi)*drhopi.b[i] +
00635                           0.375*kapakapi*iakapi*csqr(beta)*drho2.b[i]));
00636                          
00637       for(i=0; i<2; i++)
00638         dTRP.chi[i] = 0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*
00639                         (dS12pipi.chi[i]*trppipi + dS12rhopi.chi[i]*trprhopi + dS12.chi[i]*trprr); 
00640         
00641       trpdone = 1;
00642     }
00643     
00644     // Vl2Tpp - {L2 S12(p,p)}_H
00645     if (!l2tppdone && (type == Vl2Tpp || type == tVl2Tpp)) {
00646       
00647       // l2tpppipi
00648       l2tpppipi = 60*cpow(alpha, 3)*kapakapi*pi2 + 117*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*pi2*rho2
00649                    - 33*csqr(alpha*kapakapi*rhopi) 
00650                    - 21*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rho2*csqr(rhopi) 
00651                    + 33*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*pi2*csqr(rho2)
00652                    + 2*cpow(kapakapi,4)*L2*csqr(rho2)
00653                    + 3*cpow(kapakapi,3)*cpow(rho2,3)*thelakapi
00654                    - 6*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*csqr(rho2)*rhopi
00655                    + 3*csqr(alpha)*(9 - 35*kapakapi*psi)
00656                    - 42*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*rho2*rhopi
00657                    - 30*csqr(alpha)*beta*kapakapi*rhopi
00658                    + alpha*kapakapi*(74 - 196.5*kapakapi*psi + 15*theta)*rho2
00659                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(16 + 21*theta - 52.5*kapakapi*psi)*csqr(rho2);
00660 
00661       dl2tpppipi.a = 180*csqr(alpha)*dalpha*kapakapi*pi2 + 60*cpow(alpha,3)*(dkapakapi*pi2 + kapakapi*dpi2.a)
00662                    + 234*(alpha*dalpha*csqr(kapakapi) + csqr(alpha)*dkapakapi*kapakapi)*pi2*rho2 
00663                      + 117*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*(dpi2.a*rho2 + pi2*drho2.a)
00664                    - 66*(alpha*dalpha*csqr(kapakapi*rhopi) + kapakapi*dkapakapi*csqr(alpha*rhopi)
00665                          + csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*rhopi*drhopi.a)
00666                    - 21*(dalpha*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*alpha*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*rho2*csqr(rhopi)
00667                      - 21*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drho2.a*csqr(rhopi) + 2*rho2*rhopi*drhopi.a)
00668                    + 33*(dalpha*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*alpha*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*pi2*csqr(rho2)
00669                      + 33*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(dpi2.a*csqr(rho2) + 2*pi2*rho2*drho2.a)
00670                    + 8*cpow(kapakapi,3)*dkapakapi*L2*csqr(rho2) 
00671                      + 2*cpow(kapakapi,4)*(dL2.a*csqr(rho2) + 2*L2*rho2*drho2.a)
00672                    + 9*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi*cpow(rho2,3)*thelakapi
00673                      + 9*cpow(kapakapi,3)*csqr(rho2)*drho2.a*thelakapi 
00674                      + 3*cpow(kapakapi*rho2,3)*dthelakapi
00675                    - 6*dbeta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*csqr(rho2)*rhopi
00676                      - 18*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi*csqr(rho2)*rhopi
00677                      - 6*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(2*rho2*drho2.a*rhopi + csqr(rho2)*drhopi.a)
00678                    + 6*alpha*dalpha*(9 - 35*kapakapi*psi)
00679                      - 105*csqr(alpha)*(dkapakapi*psi + kapakapi*dpsi)
00680                    - 42*(dalpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi) + alpha*dbeta*csqr(kapakapi) 
00681                          + 2*alpha*beta*kapakapi*dkapakapi)*rho2*rhopi
00682                      - 42*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*(drho2.a*rhopi + rho2*drhopi.a)
00683                    - 30*(2*alpha*dalpha*beta*kapakapi + csqr(alpha)*dbeta*kapakapi
00684                          + csqr(alpha)*beta*dkapakapi)*rhopi
00685                      - 30*csqr(alpha)*beta*kapakapi*drhopi.a
00686                    + (dalpha*kapakapi + alpha*dkapakapi)*(74 - 196.5*kapakapi*psi + 15*theta)*rho2
00687                      + alpha*kapakapi*(-196.5*dkapakapi*psi - 196.5*kapakapi*dpsi + 15*dtheta)*rho2
00688                      + alpha*kapakapi*(74 - 196.5*kapakapi*psi + 15*theta)*drho2.a
00689                    + 2*(kapakapi*dkapakapi*csqr(rho2) + csqr(kapakapi)*rho2*drho2.a)
00690                         *(16 + 21*theta - 52.5*kapakapi*psi)
00691                      + csqr(kapakapi*rho2)*(21*dtheta - 52.5*dkapakapi*psi - 52.5*kapakapi*dpsi);          
00692       
00693       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00694         dl2tpppipi.b[i] = 60*cpow(alpha,3)*kapakapi*dpi2.b[i] 
00695                    + 117*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*(dpi2.b[i]*rho2 + pi2*drho2.b[i])
00696                    - 66*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*rhopi*drhopi.b[i]
00697                    - 21*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drho2.b[i]*csqr(rhopi) + 2*rho2*rhopi*drhopi.b[i])
00698                    + 33*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(dpi2.b[i]*csqr(rho2) + 2*pi2*rho2*drho2.b[i])
00699                    + 2*cpow(kapakapi,4)*(dL2.b[i]*csqr(rho2) + 2*L2*rho2*drho2.b[i])
00700                    + 9*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*csqr(rho2)*drho2.b[i]
00701                    - 6*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(2*rho2*drho2.b[i]*rhopi + csqr(rho2)*drhopi.b[i])
00702                    - 42*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*(drho2.b[i]*rhopi + rho2*drhopi.b[i])
00703                    - 30*csqr(alpha)*beta*kapakapi*drhopi.b[i]
00704                    + alpha*kapakapi*(74 - 196.5*kapakapi*psi + 15*theta)*drho2.b[i]
00705                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(16 + 21*theta - 52.5*kapakapi*psi)*2*rho2*drho2.b[i];
00706                   
00707                    
00708       // l2tpprhopi                        
00709       l2tpprhopi = 24*alpha*cpow(kapakapi*rhopi,3)
00710                    - 96*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*pi2*rhopi
00711                    - 48*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rhopi*rho2*pi2
00712                    - 4*cpow(kapakapi,4)*rho2*rhopi*L2
00713                    - 6*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*csqr(rho2)*rhopi
00714                    - 4.5*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rho2*L2
00715                    + 12*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rho2*csqr(rhopi)
00716                    - 34.5*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*L2
00717                    + 30*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi*rhopi)
00718                    - 30*csqr(alpha)*beta*kapakapi*pi2
00719                    - 1.5*alpha*beta*(9 - 35*kapakapi*psi)
00720                    + alpha*kapakapi*(-138 + 60*theta + 201*kapakapi*psi)*rhopi
00721                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(-68 + 87*kapakapi*psi + 12*theta)*rho2*rhopi
00722                    - 4.5*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi*csqr(rho2)
00723                    + beta*kapakapi*(-17.5 - 7.5*theta + 48*kapakapi*psi)*rho2;
00724                    
00725       dl2tpprhopi.a = 24*dalpha*cpow(kapakapi*rhopi,3) 
00726                      + 72*alpha*csqr(kapakapi*rhopi)*(dkapakapi*rhopi + kapakapi*drhopi.a) 
00727                    - 192*alpha*kapakapi*(dalpha*kapakapi + alpha*dkapakapi)*pi2*rhopi
00728                      - 96*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*(dpi2.a*rhopi + pi2*drhopi.a)
00729                    - 48*(dalpha*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*alpha*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*rhopi*rho2*pi2
00730                      - 48*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drhopi.a*rho2*pi2 + rhopi*drho2.a*pi2 + rhopi*rho2*dpi2.a)
00731                    - 16*cpow(kapakapi,3)*dkapakapi*rho2*rhopi*L2
00732                      - 4*cpow(kapakapi,4)*(drho2.a*rhopi*L2 + rho2*drhopi.a*L2 + rho2*rhopi*dL2.a)
00733                    - 6*(3*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi*thelakapi + cpow(kapakapi,3)*dthelakapi)*csqr(rho2)*rhopi
00734                      - 6*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*(2*rho2*drho2.a*rhopi + csqr(rho2)*drhopi.a)
00735                    - 4.5*(dbeta*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*rho2*L2
00736                      - 4.5*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drho2.a*L2 + rho2*dL2.a)
00737                    + 12*(dbeta*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*rho2*csqr(rhopi)
00738                      + 12*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drho2.a*csqr(rhopi) + 2*rho2*rhopi*drhopi.a)
00739                    - 34.5*(dalpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi) + alpha*dbeta*csqr(kapakapi) 
00740                            + 2*alpha*beta*kapakapi*dkapakapi)*L2
00741                      - 34.5*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*dL2.a
00742                    + 30*(dalpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi) + alpha*dbeta*csqr(kapakapi) 
00743                            + 2*alpha*beta*kapakapi*dkapakapi)*csqr(rhopi)
00744                      + 60*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*rhopi*drhopi.a
00745                    - 30*(2*alpha*dalpha*beta*kapakapi + csqr(alpha)*dbeta*kapakapi 
00746                          + csqr(alpha)*beta*dkapakapi)*pi2
00747                      - 30*csqr(alpha)*beta*kapakapi*dpi2.a
00748                    - 1.5*(dalpha*beta + alpha*dbeta)*(9 - 35*kapakapi*psi)
00749                      + 52.5*alpha*beta*(dkapakapi*psi + kapakapi*dpsi)
00750                    + ((dalpha*kapakapi + alpha*dkapakapi)*rhopi + alpha*kapakapi*drhopi.a)
00751                         *(-138 + 60*theta + 201*kapakapi*psi)
00752                      + alpha*kapakapi*(60*dtheta + 201*dkapakapi*psi + 201*kapakapi*dpsi)*rhopi
00753                    + (2*kapakapi*dkapakapi*rho2*rhopi + csqr(kapakapi)*(drho2.a*rhopi + rho2*drhopi.a))
00754                         *(-68 + 87*kapakapi*psi + 12*theta)
00755                      + csqr(kapakapi)*(87*dkapakapi*psi + 87*kapakapi*dpsi + 12*dtheta)*rho2*rhopi
00756                    - 4.5*(dbeta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi + 2*beta*kapakapi*dkapakapi*thelakapi
00757                           + beta*csqr(kapakapi)*dthelakapi)*csqr(rho2)
00758                      - 9*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi*rho2*drho2.a
00759                    + ((dbeta*kapakapi + beta*dkapakapi)*rho2 + beta*kapakapi*drho2.a)
00760                         *(-17.5 - 7.5*theta + 48*kapakapi*psi)
00761                      + beta*kapakapi*(48*dkapakapi*psi + 48*kapakapi*dpsi -7.5*dtheta)*rho2;  
00762       
00763       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00764         dl2tpprhopi.b[i] = 72*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*csqr(rhopi)*drhopi.b[i]
00765                    - 96*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*(dpi2.b[i]*rhopi + pi2*drhopi.b[i])
00766                    - 48*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)
00767                         *(drhopi.b[i]*rho2*pi2 + rhopi*drho2.b[i]*pi2 +rhopi*rho2*dpi2.b[i])
00768                    - 4*cpow(kapakapi,4)*(drho2.b[i]*rhopi*L2 + rho2*drhopi.b[i]*L2 + rho2*rhopi*dL2.b[i])
00769                    - 6*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*(2*rho2*drho2.b[i]*rhopi + csqr(rho2)*drhopi.b[i])
00770                    - 4.5*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drho2.b[i]*L2 + rho2*dL2.b[i])
00771                    + 12*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drho2.b[i]*csqr(rhopi) + 2*rho2*rhopi*drhopi.b[i])
00772                    - 34.5*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*dL2.b[i]
00773                    + 60*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*rhopi*drhopi.b[i]
00774                    - 30*csqr(alpha)*beta*kapakapi*dpi2.b[i]
00775                    + alpha*kapakapi*(-138 + 60*theta + 201*kapakapi*psi)*drhopi.b[i]
00776                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(-68 + 12*theta + 87*kapakapi*psi)*(drho2.b[i]*rhopi + rho2*drhopi.b[i])
00777                    - 9*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi*rho2*drho2.b[i]
00778                    + beta*kapakapi*(-17.5 - 7.5*theta + 48*kapakapi*psi)*drho2.b[i];
00779                    
00780                      
00781       // l2tppll
00782       l2tppll = 42*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*pi2 - 9*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*csqr(rhopi)
00783                    + 15*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*pi2*rho2 
00784                    + cpow(kapakapi,4)*rho2*L2
00785                    + 1.5*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*csqr(rho2)
00786                    - 3*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rhopi*rho2
00787                    - 21*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*rhopi
00788                    + alpha*kapakapi*(30 - 73.5*kapakapi*psi)
00789                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(6 - 24*kapakapi*psi + 10.5*theta)*rho2;
00790                    
00791       dl2tppll.a = 84*(alpha*dalpha*csqr(kapakapi) + csqr(alpha)*kapakapi*dkapakapi)*pi2
00792                      + 42*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*dpi2.a
00793                    - 9*(dalpha*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*alpha*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*csqr(rhopi)
00794                      - 18*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rhopi*drhopi.a
00795                    + 15*(dalpha*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*alpha*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*pi2*rho2
00796                      + 15*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(dpi2.a*rho2 + pi2*drho2.a)
00797                    + 4*cpow(kapakapi,3)*dkapakapi*rho2*L2
00798                      + cpow(kapakapi,4)*(drho2.a*L2 + rho2*dL2.a)
00799                    + 1.5*(3*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi*thelakapi + cpow(kapakapi,3)*dthelakapi)*csqr(rho2)
00800                      + 3*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*rho2*drho2.a
00801                    - 3*(dbeta*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*rhopi*rho2
00802                      - 3*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drhopi.a*rho2 + rhopi*drho2.a)
00803                    - 21*(dalpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi) + alpha*dbeta*csqr(kapakapi) 
00804                          + 2*alpha*beta*kapakapi*dkapakapi)*rhopi
00805                      - 21*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*drhopi.a
00806                    + (dalpha*kapakapi + alpha*dkapakapi)*(30 - 73.5*kapakapi*psi)
00807                      -73.5*alpha*kapakapi*(dkapakapi*psi + kapakapi*dpsi)
00808                    + (2*kapakapi*dkapakapi*rho2 + csqr(kapakapi)*drho2.a)*(6 - 24*kapakapi*psi + 10.5*theta)
00809                      + csqr(kapakapi)*(-24*dkapakapi*psi - 24*kapakapi*dpsi + 10.5*dtheta)*rho2;
00810                      
00811       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00812         dl2tppll.b[i] = 42*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*dpi2.b[i]
00813                    - 18*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rhopi*drhopi.b[i]
00814                    + 15*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(dpi2.b[i]*rho2 + pi2*drho2.b[i])
00815                    + cpow(kapakapi,4)*(drho2.b[i]*L2 + rho2*dL2.b[i])
00816                    + 3*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*rho2*drho2.b[i]
00817                    - 3*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drhopi.b[i]*rho2 + rhopi*drho2.b[i])
00818                    - 21*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*drhopi.b[i]
00819                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(6 - 24*kapakapi*psi + 10.5*theta)*drho2.b[i];         
00820         
00821                    
00822       // l2tpprr           
00823       l2tpprr = 12*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*pi2*csqr(rhopi)
00824                    + 2*cpow(kapakapi,4)*csqr(rhopi)*L2
00825                    + 3.75*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*rho2*csqr(rhopi)
00826                    - 0.75*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*pi2*csqr(rho2)
00827                    - 0.75*csqr(kapakapi*thelakapi*rho2)
00828                    + 6*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rhopi*(L2 - csqr(rhopi))
00829                    + 24*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*pi2*rhopi
00830                    + alpha*kapakapi*(-35 + 34.5*kapakapi*psi + 15*theta)*pi2
00831                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(78.5 - 41.25*kapakapi*psi - 56.25*theta)*csqr(rhopi)
00832                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(-14.5 + 12.75*kapakapi*psi + 5.25*theta)*pi2*rho2
00833                    + kapakapi*thelakapi*(-9.75 + 3.75*theta + 13.5*kapakapi*psi)*rho2
00834                    + 7.5*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi*rho2*rhopi
00835                    + beta*kapakapi*(37 - 67.5*kapakapi*psi - 7.5*theta)*rhopi
00836                    - 13.5 + 6.75*theta - 47.25*csqr(kapakapi*psi)
00837                    + 5.25*kapakapi*(13 - 5*theta)*psi;
00838                    
00839       dl2tpprr.a = 12*(dalpha*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*alpha*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*pi2*csqr(rhopi)
00840                      + 12*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(dpi2.a*csqr(rhopi) + 2*pi2*rhopi*drhopi.a)
00841                    + 8*cpow(kapakapi,3)*dkapakapi*csqr(rhopi)*L2
00842                      + 2*cpow(kapakapi,4)*(2*rhopi*drhopi.a*L2 + csqr(rhopi)*dL2.a)
00843                    + 3.75*(3*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi*thelakapi + cpow(kapakapi,3)*dthelakapi)*rho2*csqr(rhopi)
00844                      + 3.75*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*(drho2.a*csqr(rhopi) + 2*rho2*rhopi*drhopi.a)
00845                    - 0.75*(3*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi*thelakapi + cpow(kapakapi,3)*dthelakapi)*pi2*csqr(rho2)
00846                      - 0.75*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*(dpi2.a*csqr(rho2) + 2*pi2*rho2*drho2.a)
00847                    - 1.5*(kapakapi*dkapakapi*csqr(thelakapi*rho2) + csqr(kapakapi*rho2)*thelakapi*dthelakapi)
00848                      - 1.5*csqr(kapakapi*thelakapi)*rho2*drho2.a
00849                    + 6*(dbeta*cpow(kapakapi,3) + 3*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*dkapakapi)*rhopi*(L2 - csqr(rhopi))
00850                      + 6*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drhopi.a*(L2 - csqr(rhopi)) + rhopi*(dL2.a - 2*rhopi*drhopi.a))
00851                    + 24*((dalpha*beta + alpha*dbeta)*csqr(kapakapi) + 2*alpha*beta*kapakapi*dkapakapi)*pi2*rhopi
00852                      + 24*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*(dpi2.a*rhopi + pi2*drhopi.a)
00853                    + (dalpha*kapakapi*pi2 + alpha*dkapakapi*pi2 + alpha*kapakapi*dpi2.a)
00854                         *(-35 + 34.5*kapakapi*psi + 15*theta)
00855                      + alpha*kapakapi*(34.5*dkapakapi*psi + 34.5*kapakapi*dpsi + 15*dtheta)*pi2
00856                    + 2*(kapakapi*dkapakapi*csqr(rhopi) + csqr(kapakapi)*rhopi*drhopi.a)
00857                         *(78.5 - 41.25*kapakapi*psi - 56.25*theta)
00858                      - csqr(kapakapi*rhopi)*(41.25*dkapakapi*psi + 41.25*kapakapi*dpsi + 56.25*dtheta)
00859                    + (2*kapakapi*dkapakapi*pi2*rho2 + csqr(kapakapi)*(dpi2.a*rho2 + pi2*drho2.a))
00860                         *(-14.5 + 12.75*kapakapi*psi + 5.25*theta)
00861                      + csqr(kapakapi)*pi2*rho2*(12.75*dkapakapi*psi + 12.75*kapakapi*dpsi + 5.25*dtheta)
00862                    + (dkapakapi*thelakapi*rho2 + kapakapi*dthelakapi*rho2 + kapakapi*thelakapi*drho2.a)
00863                         *(-9.75 + 3.75*theta + 13.5*kapakapi*psi)
00864                      + kapakapi*thelakapi*rho2*(13.5*dkapakapi*psi + 13.5*kapakapi*dpsi + 3.75*dtheta) 
00865                    + 7.5*(dbeta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi + 2*beta*kapakapi*dkapakapi*thelakapi
00866                         + beta*csqr(kapakapi)*dthelakapi)*rho2*rhopi
00867                      + 7.5*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi*(drho2.a*rhopi + rho2*drhopi.a)
00868                    + (dbeta*kapakapi*rhopi + beta*dkapakapi*rhopi + beta*kapakapi*drhopi.a)
00869                         *(37 - 67.5*kapakapi*psi - 7.5*theta)
00870                      - beta*kapakapi*rhopi*(67.5*dkapakapi*psi + 67.5*kapakapi*dpsi + 7.5*dtheta)
00871                    + 6.75*dtheta - 94.5*(kapakapi*dkapakapi*csqr(psi) + csqr(kapakapi)*psi*dpsi)
00872                    + 5.25*(dkapakapi*psi + kapakapi*dpsi)*(13 - 5*theta)
00873                      - 26.25*kapakapi*psi*dtheta; 
00874                      
00875       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00876         dl2tpprr.b[i] = 12*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(dpi2.b[i]*csqr(rhopi) + 2*pi2*rhopi*drhopi.b[i])
00877                    + 2*cpow(kapakapi,4)*(2*rhopi*drhopi.b[i]*L2 + csqr(rhopi)*dL2.b[i])
00878                    + 3.75*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*(drho2.b[i]*csqr(rhopi) + 2*rho2*rhopi*drhopi.b[i])
00879                    - 0.75*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*(dpi2.b[i]*csqr(rho2) + 2*pi2*rho2*drho2.b[i])
00880                    - 1.5*csqr(kapakapi*thelakapi)*rho2*drho2.b[i]
00881                    + 6*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*(drhopi.b[i]*(L2-csqr(rhopi))+rhopi*(dL2.b[i]-2*rhopi*drhopi.b[i]))
00882                    + 24*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*(dpi2.b[i]*rhopi + pi2*drhopi.b[i])
00883                    + alpha*kapakapi*(-35 + 34.5*kapakapi*psi + 15*theta)*dpi2.b[i]
00884                    + 2*csqr(kapakapi)*(78.5 - 41.25*kapakapi*psi -56.25*theta)*rhopi*drhopi.b[i]
00885                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(-14.5 + 12.75*kapakapi*psi + 5.25*theta)*(dpi2.b[i]*rho2 + pi2*drho2.b[i])
00886                    + kapakapi*thelakapi*(-9.75 + 3.75*theta + 13.5*kapakapi*psi)*drho2.b[i]
00887                    + 7.5*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi*(drho2.b[i]*rhopi + rho2*drhopi.b[i])
00888                    + beta*kapakapi*(37 - 67.5*kapakapi*psi - 7.5*theta)*drhopi.b[i];
00889                    
00890                    
00891       // L2TPP combined     
00892       L2TPP = csqr(kapakapi)*(S12pipi*l2tpppipi + S12rhopi*l2tpprhopi + S12*l2tpprr + S12ll*l2tppll);
00893       
00894       dL2TPP.a = 2*L2TPP/kapakapi*dkapakapi
00895                  + csqr(kapakapi)*(dS12pipi.a*l2tpppipi + S12pipi*dl2tpppipi.a
00896                                    + dS12rhopi.a*l2tpprhopi + S12rhopi*dl2tpprhopi.a
00897                                    + dS12.a*l2tpprr + S12*dl2tpprr.a
00898                                    + dS12ll.a*l2tppll + S12ll*dl2tppll.a);
00899                                    
00900       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00901         dL2TPP.b[i] = csqr(kapakapi)*(dS12pipi.b[i]*l2tpppipi + S12pipi*dl2tpppipi.b[i]
00902                                    + dS12rhopi.b[i]*l2tpprhopi + S12rhopi*dl2tpprhopi.b[i]
00903                                    + dS12.b[i]*l2tpprr + S12*dl2tpprr.b[i]
00904                                    + dS12ll.b[i]*l2tppll + S12ll*dl2tppll.b[i]);
00905                                    
00906       for(i=0; i<2; i++)
00907         dL2TPP.chi[i] = csqr(kapakapi)*(dS12pipi.chi[i]*l2tpppipi + dS12rhopi.chi[i]*l2tpprhopi
00908                                    + dS12.chi[i]*l2tpprr + dS12ll.chi[i]*l2tppll);
00909       
00910       l2tppdone = 1;
00911                     
00912     }
00913     
00914     // Central Potentials
00915     if (type == V && TT) {
00916       *v += gamma*TT*SS*RR*Gi;
00917 
00918       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00919         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dSS.chi[i]*RR*Gi;
00920       dv->a += gamma*TT*SS*(dRR.a*Gi+RR*dGi.a);
00921       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00922         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*SS*(dRR.b[i]*Gi+RR*dGi.b[i]);
00923     } 
00924     else if (type == sV && TT) {
00925       *v += gamma*TT*sigsig*RR*Gi;
00926 
00927       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00928         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dsigsig.chi[i]*RR*Gi;
00929       dv->a += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dRR.a*Gi+RR*dGi.a);
00930       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00931         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dRR.b[i]*Gi+RR*dGi.b[i]);
00932     } 
00933     else if (type == tV && tautau) {
00934       *v += gamma*tautau*SS*RR*Gi;
00935 
00936       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00937         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dSS.chi[i]*RR*Gi;
00938       dv->a += gamma*tautau*SS*(dRR.a*Gi+RR*dGi.a);
00939       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00940         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*SS*(dRR.b[i]*Gi+RR*dGi.b[i]);
00941     } 
00942     else if (type == tsV && tautau) {
00943       *v += gamma*tautau*sigsig*RR*Gi;
00944 
00945       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00946         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dsigsig.chi[i]*RR*Gi;
00947       dv->a += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dRR.a*Gi+RR*dGi.a);
00948       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00949         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dRR.b[i]*Gi+RR*dGi.b[i]);
00950     } 
00951 
00952     // p2V Potentials
00953     else if (type == p2V && TT) {
00954       *v += gamma*TT*SS*PiPi*RR*Gi;
00955 
00956       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00957         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dSS.chi[i]*PiPi*RR*Gi;
00958       dv->a += gamma*TT*SS*(dPiPi.a*RR*Gi+PiPi*dRR.a*Gi+PiPi*RR*dGi.a);
00959       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00960         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*SS*(dPiPi.b[i]*RR*Gi+PiPi*dRR.b[i]*Gi+PiPi*RR*dGi.b[i]);
00961     } 
00962     else if (type == sp2V && TT) {
00963       *v += gamma*TT*sigsig*PiPi*RR*Gi;
00964 
00965       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00966         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dsigsig.chi[i]*PiPi*RR*Gi;
00967       dv->a += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dPiPi.a*RR*Gi+PiPi*dRR.a*Gi+PiPi*RR*dGi.a);
00968       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00969         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dPiPi.b[i]*RR*Gi+PiPi*dRR.b[i]*Gi+PiPi*RR*dGi.b[i]);
00970     } 
00971     else if (type == tp2V && tautau) {
00972       *v += gamma*tautau*SS*PiPi*RR*Gi;
00973 
00974       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00975         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dSS.chi[i]*PiPi*RR*Gi;
00976       dv->a += gamma*tautau*SS*(dPiPi.a*RR*Gi+PiPi*dRR.a*Gi+PiPi*RR*dGi.a);
00977       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00978         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*SS*(dPiPi.b[i]*RR*Gi+PiPi*dRR.b[i]*Gi+PiPi*RR*dGi.b[i]);
00979     } 
00980     else if (type == tsp2V && tautau) {
00981       *v += gamma*tautau*sigsig*PiPi*RR*Gi;
00982 
00983       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00984         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dsigsig.chi[i]*PiPi*RR*Gi;
00985       dv->a += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dPiPi.a*RR*Gi+PiPi*dRR.a*Gi+PiPi*RR*dGi.a);
00986       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00987         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dPiPi.b[i]*RR*Gi+PiPi*dRR.b[i]*Gi+PiPi*RR*dGi.b[i]);
00988     } 
00989 
00990     // Vp2 Potentials
00991     else if (type == Vp2 && TT) {
00992       *v += gamma*TT*SS*PiPiG*RR*Gi;
00993 
00994       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00995         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dSS.chi[i]*PiPiG*RR*Gi;
00996       dv->a += gamma*TT*SS*(dPiPiG.a*RR*Gi+PiPiG*dRR.a*Gi+PiPiG*RR*dGi.a);
00997       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00998         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*SS*(dPiPiG.b[i]*RR*Gi+PiPiG*dRR.b[i]*Gi+PiPiG*RR*dGi.b[i]);
00999     } 
01000     else if (type == sVp2 && TT) {
01001       *v += gamma*TT*sigsig*PiPiG*RR*Gi;
01002 
01003       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01004         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dsigsig.chi[i]*PiPiG*RR*Gi;
01005       dv->a += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dPiPiG.a*RR*Gi+PiPiG*dRR.a*Gi+PiPiG*RR*dGi.a);
01006       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01007         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dPiPiG.b[i]*RR*Gi+PiPiG*dRR.b[i]*Gi+PiPiG*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01008     } 
01009     else if (type == tVp2 && tautau) {
01010       *v += gamma*tautau*SS*PiPiG*RR*Gi;
01011 
01012       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01013         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dSS.chi[i]*PiPiG*RR*Gi;
01014       dv->a += gamma*tautau*SS*(dPiPiG.a*RR*Gi+PiPiG*dRR.a*Gi+PiPiG*RR*dGi.a);
01015       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01016         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*SS*(dPiPiG.b[i]*RR*Gi+PiPiG*dRR.b[i]*Gi+PiPiG*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01017     } 
01018     else if (type == tsVp2 && tautau) {
01019       *v += gamma*tautau*sigsig*PiPiG*RR*Gi;
01020 
01021       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01022         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dsigsig.chi[i]*PiPiG*RR*Gi;
01023       dv->a += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dPiPiG.a*RR*Gi+PiPiG*dRR.a*Gi+PiPiG*RR*dGi.a);
01024       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01025         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dPiPiG.b[i]*RR*Gi+PiPiG*dRR.b[i]*Gi+PiPiG*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01026     } 
01027 
01028     // pr2 Potentials
01029     else if (type == pr2V && TT) {
01030       *v += gamma*TT*SS*PirPir*RR*Gi;
01031 
01032       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01033         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dSS.chi[i]*PirPir*RR*Gi;
01034       dv->a += gamma*TT*SS*(dPirPir.a*RR*Gi+PirPir*dRR.a*Gi+PirPir*RR*dGi.a);
01035       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01036         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*SS*(dPirPir.b[i]*RR*Gi+PirPir*dRR.b[i]*Gi+
01037                                 PirPir*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01038     } 
01039     else if (type == spr2V && TT) {
01040       *v += gamma*TT*sigsig*PirPir*RR*Gi;
01041 
01042       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01043         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dsigsig.chi[i]*PirPir*RR*Gi;
01044       dv->a += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dPirPir.a*RR*Gi+PirPir*dRR.a*Gi+PirPir*RR*dGi.a);
01045       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01046         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dPirPir.b[i]*RR*Gi+PirPir*dRR.b[i]*Gi+
01047                                     PirPir*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01048     } 
01049     else if (type == tpr2V && tautau) {
01050       *v += gamma*tautau*SS*PirPir*RR*Gi;
01051 
01052       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01053         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dSS.chi[i]*PirPir*RR*Gi;
01054       dv->a += gamma*tautau*SS*(dPirPir.a*RR*Gi+PirPir*dRR.a*Gi+PirPir*RR*dGi.a);
01055       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01056         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*SS*(dPirPir.b[i]*RR*Gi+PirPir*dRR.b[i]*Gi+
01057                                     PirPir*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01058     } 
01059     else if (type == tspr2V && tautau) {
01060       *v += gamma*tautau*sigsig*PirPir*RR*Gi;
01061 
01062       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01063         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dsigsig.chi[i]*PirPir*RR*Gi;
01064       dv->a += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dPirPir.a*RR*Gi+PirPir*dRR.a*Gi+PirPir*RR*dGi.a);
01065       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01066         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dPirPir.b[i]*RR*Gi+PirPir*dRR.b[i]*Gi+
01067                                         PirPir*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01068     } 
01069 
01070     // L2 Potentials
01071     else if (type == Vl2 && TT) {
01072       *v += gamma*TT*SS*RR*Gi*LL;
01073         
01074       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01075         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dSS.chi[i]*RR*Gi*LL;
01076       dv->a += gamma*TT*SS*(dRR.a*Gi*LL + RR*dGi.a*LL + RR*Gi*dLL.a);
01077       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01078         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*SS*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*LL + RR*dGi.b[i]*LL + RR*Gi*dLL.b[i]);    
01079     }
01080     else if (type == sVl2 && TT) {
01081       *v += gamma*TT*sigsig*RR*Gi*LL;
01082         
01083       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01084         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dsigsig.chi[i]*RR*Gi*LL;
01085       dv->a += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dRR.a*Gi*LL + RR*dGi.a*LL + RR*Gi*dLL.a);
01086       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01087         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*sigsig*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*LL + RR*dGi.b[i]*LL + RR*Gi*dLL.b[i]);    
01088     }
01089     else if (type == tVl2 && tautau) {
01090       *v += gamma*tautau*SS*RR*Gi*LL;
01091         
01092       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01093         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dSS.chi[i]*RR*Gi*LL;
01094       dv->a += gamma*tautau*SS*(dRR.a*Gi*LL + RR*dGi.a*LL + RR*Gi*dLL.a);
01095       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01096         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*SS*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*LL + RR*dGi.b[i]*LL + RR*Gi*dLL.b[i]);    
01097     }
01098     else if (type == tsVl2 && tautau) {
01099       *v += gamma*tautau*sigsig*RR*Gi*LL;
01100         
01101       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01102         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dsigsig.chi[i]*RR*Gi*LL;
01103       dv->a += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dRR.a*Gi*LL + RR*dGi.a*LL + RR*Gi*dLL.a);
01104       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01105         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*LL + RR*dGi.b[i]*LL + RR*Gi*dLL.b[i]);    
01106     }
01107     
01108     // Spin-Orbit Potentials
01109     else if (type == Vls && TT) {
01110       *v += gamma*TT*LS*kapakapi*RR*Gi;
01111 
01112       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01113         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dLS.chi[i]*kapakapi*RR*Gi;
01114       dv->a += gamma*TT*(dLS.a*kapakapi*RR*Gi+LS*dkapakapi*RR*Gi+
01115                         LS*kapakapi*dRR.a*Gi+LS*kapakapi*RR*dGi.a);
01116       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01117         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*kapakapi*(dLS.b[i]*RR*Gi+LS*dRR.b[i]*Gi+LS*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01118     } 
01119     else if (type == tVls && tautau) {
01120       *v += gamma*tautau*LS*kapakapi*RR*Gi;
01121 
01122       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01123         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dLS.chi[i]*kapakapi*RR*Gi;
01124       dv->a += gamma*tautau*(dLS.a*kapakapi*RR*Gi+LS*dkapakapi*RR*Gi+
01125                             LS*kapakapi*dRR.a*Gi+LS*kapakapi*RR*dGi.a);
01126       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01127         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*kapakapi*(dLS.b[i]*RR*Gi+LS*dRR.b[i]*Gi+LS*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01128     } 
01129 
01130     // L2LS Potentials
01131     else if (type == Vl2ls && TT) {
01132       *v += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*L2LS;
01133       
01134       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01135         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*dL2LS.chi[i];
01136       dv->a += gamma*TT*(dRR.a*Gi*L2LS + RR*dGi.a*L2LS + RR*Gi*dL2LS.a);
01137       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01138         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*L2LS + RR*dGi.b[i]*L2LS + RR*Gi*dL2LS.b[i]);
01139     }
01140     else if (type == tVl2ls && tautau) {
01141       *v += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*L2LS;
01142       
01143       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01144         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*dL2LS.chi[i];
01145       dv->a += gamma*tautau*(dRR.a*Gi*L2LS + RR*dGi.a*L2LS + RR*Gi*dL2LS.a);
01146       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01147         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*L2LS + RR*dGi.b[i]*L2LS + RR*Gi*dL2LS.b[i]);
01148     }
01149 
01150     // Tensor Potentials
01151     else if (type == VT && TT) {
01152       *v += gamma*TT*S12*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*Gi;
01153 
01154       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01155         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dS12.chi[i]*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*Gi;
01156       dv->a += gamma*TT*(dS12.a*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*Gi+
01157                         2*S12*kapakapi*dkapakapi*RR*Gi+
01158                         S12*csqr(kapakapi)*dRR.a*Gi+S12*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*dGi.a);
01159       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01160         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*csqr(kapakapi)*(dS12.b[i]*RR*Gi+S12*dRR.b[i]*Gi+
01161                                              S12*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01162     } 
01163     else if (type == tVT && tautau) {
01164       *v += gamma*tautau*S12*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*Gi;
01165 
01166       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01167         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*dS12.chi[i]*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*Gi;
01168       dv->a += gamma*tautau*(dS12.a*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*Gi+
01169                             2*S12*kapakapi*dkapakapi*RR*Gi+
01170                             S12*csqr(kapakapi)*dRR.a*Gi+S12*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*dGi.a);
01171       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01172         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*csqr(kapakapi)*(dS12.b[i]*RR*Gi+S12*dRR.b[i]*Gi+
01173                                                  S12*RR*dGi.b[i]);
01174     } 
01175 
01176     // TLL Potentials
01177     else if (type == VTll && TT) {
01178       *v += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*TLL;
01179       
01180       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01181         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*dTLL.chi[i];
01182       dv->a += gamma*TT*(dRR.a*Gi*TLL + RR*dGi.a*TLL + RR*Gi*dTLL.a);
01183       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01184         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*TLL + RR*dGi.b[i]*TLL + RR*Gi*dTLL.b[i]);
01185     }
01186     else if (type == tVTll && tautau) {
01187       *v += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*TLL;
01188       
01189       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01190         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*dTLL.chi[i];
01191       dv->a += gamma*tautau*(dRR.a*Gi*TLL + RR*dGi.a*TLL + RR*Gi*dTLL.a);
01192       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01193         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*TLL + RR*dGi.b[i]*TLL + RR*Gi*dTLL.b[i]);
01194     }
01195              
01196     // TPP
01197     else if (type == VTpp && TT) {
01198       *v += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*TPP;
01199       
01200       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01201         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*dTPP.chi[i];
01202       dv->a += gamma*TT*(dRR.a*Gi*TPP + RR*dGi.a*TPP + RR*Gi*dTPP.a);
01203       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01204         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*TPP + RR*dGi.b[i]*TPP + RR*Gi*dTPP.b[i]);
01205     }
01206     else if (type == tVTpp && tautau) {
01207       *v += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*TPP;
01208       
01209       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01210         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*dTPP.chi[i];
01211       dv->a += gamma*tautau*(dRR.a*Gi*TPP + RR*dGi.a*TPP + RR*Gi*dTPP.a);
01212       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01213         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*TPP + RR*dGi.b[i]*TPP + RR*Gi*dTPP.b[i]);
01214     }
01215     
01216     // (p_r v(r) + v(r) p_r)S12(r,p)
01217     else if (type == prVTrp && TT) {
01218       *v += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*TRP;
01219       
01220       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01221         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*dTRP.chi[i];
01222       dv->a += gamma*TT*(dRR.a*Gi*TRP + RR*dGi.a*TRP + RR*Gi*dTRP.a);
01223       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01224         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*TRP + RR*dGi.b[i]*TRP + RR*Gi*dTRP.b[i]);
01225     }
01226     else if (type == tprVTrp && tautau) {
01227       *v += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*TRP;
01228       
01229       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01230         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*dTRP.chi[i];
01231       dv->a += gamma*tautau*(dRR.a*Gi*TRP + RR*dGi.a*TRP + RR*Gi*dTRP.a);
01232       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01233         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*TRP + RR*dGi.b[i]*TRP + RR*Gi*dTRP.b[i]);
01234     }
01235     
01236     // {L^2 S12(p,p)}_H
01237     else if (type == Vl2Tpp && TT) {
01238       *v += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*L2TPP;
01239       
01240       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01241         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*dL2TPP.chi[i];
01242       dv->a += gamma*TT*(dRR.a*Gi*L2TPP + RR*dGi.a*L2TPP + RR*Gi*dL2TPP.a);
01243       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01244         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*L2TPP + RR*dGi.b[i]*L2TPP + RR*Gi*dL2TPP.b[i]);
01245     }
01246     else if (type == tVl2Tpp && tautau) {
01247       *v += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*L2TPP;
01248       
01249       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01250         dv->chi[i] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*dL2TPP.chi[i];
01251       dv->a += gamma*tautau*(dRR.a*Gi*L2TPP + RR*dGi.a*L2TPP + RR*Gi*dL2TPP.a);
01252       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01253         dv->b[i] += gamma*tautau*(dRR.b[i]*Gi*L2TPP + RR*dGi.b[i]*L2TPP + RR*Gi*dL2TPP.b[i]);
01254     }
01255     
01256     
01257     // Coulomb Potential
01258     else if (type == VC && TT && G1->xi == 1 && G2->xi == 1) {
01259       vcoul = 1.0/csqrt(2.0*alpha)*zcoulomb(0.5*rho2/alpha);
01260       dvcoul.a = -0.5*dalpha/alpha*vcoul +
01261         1.0/csqrt(2*alpha)*dzcoulomb(0.5*rho2/alpha)*
01262         (0.5*drho2.a/alpha-0.5*rho2/csqr(alpha)*dalpha);
01263       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01264         dvcoul.b[i] = 1.0/csqrt(2*alpha)*dzcoulomb(0.5*rho2/alpha)*0.5*drho2.b[i]/alpha;
01265 
01266       *v += gamma*TT*SS*vcoul*RR;
01267  
01268       for (i=0; i<2; i++)
01269         dv->chi[i] += gamma*TT*dSS.chi[i]*vcoul*RR;
01270       dv->a += gamma*TT*SS*(dvcoul.a*RR+vcoul*dRR.a);
01271       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
01272         dv->b[i] += gamma*TT*SS*(dvcoul.b[i]*RR+vcoul*dRR.b[i]);
01273     }
01274   }
01275 }

01278 void calcgradPotential(const Interaction *P,
01279                        const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
01280                        const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
01281                        gradSlaterDet* dv)
01282 {
01283   gradTwoBodyOperator gop_tb_pot = {opt: 0, par: P, me: gtb_pot};
01284 
01285   calcgradSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_tb_pot, dv);
01286 }
